transbit.tbits.webapps
Class WebUtil

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.webapps.WebUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
TBitsConstants, TBitsPropEnum
public class WebUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements TBitsConstants, TBitsPropEnum

This is an utility class that contains methods used by almost all the servlets in the webapps package.

Version:
: $Id: $
Author:
: Vaibhav., : Vinod Gupta .

aFieldName - Field Name.
Returns:

validateUser

public static User validateUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest aRequest)
                         throws DatabaseException,
                                TBitsException
This method checks if the user should be allowed to access the system. If yes, then it returns the corresponding User Object. If no, then it throws TBitsException.

Parameters:
aRequest - HttpRequest object.
Throws:
DatabaseException - In case of any database related errors.
TBitsExcepiton - In case of any other exceptions.

Parameters:
aRequest - HttpRequest Object which may contain information related to the clientOffset.
aResponse - HttpResponse Object which has a cookie set for storing the clientOffset on client's machine.
Returns:
Returns the clientOffset.

                                                                               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,

Parameters:
aRequest - Http Request Object.
aConfig - UserConfig.
aPage - Caller of the function.
Returns:
Hashtable that contains the BA and Request Object based on the caller.

javax.servlet.ServletException - Thrown in case of servlet related errors.
TBitsExceptionTBitsException - of any application errors.
DatabaseException - Thrown in case of any database errors.
